mnd4:3.2: Passami suddhanti passami suddham, dakkhami suddham, olokemi suddham, nijjhayami suddham, upaparikkhami suddham.
mnd4:3.3: Paramam aroganti paramam arogyappattam tanappattam lenappattam saranappattam abhayappattam accutappattam amatappattam nibbanappattanti—
mnd4:4.2: Cakkhuvinnanam rupadassanena narassa suddhi visuddhi parisuddhi, mutti vimutti parimutti hoti, naro sujjhati visujjhati parisujjhati, muccati vimuccati parimuccatiti—
mnd4:5.2: Evam abhijananto ajananto vijananto pativijananto pativijjhanto.
mnd4:5.3: “Idam paramam aggam settham visittham pamokkham uttamam pavaran”ti natva janitva tulayitva tirayitva vibhavayitva vibhutam katvati—
mnd4:6.2: Yo suddham passati, so suddhanupassi, pacceti nananti cakkhuvinnanam rupadassanena nananti pacceti, maggoti pacceti, pathoti pacceti, niyyananti paccetiti—
mnd4:10.2: Cakkhuvinnanam rupadassanena ce narassa suddhi visuddhi parisuddhi, mutti vimutti parimutti hoti, naro sujjhati visujjhati parisujjhati, muccati vimuccati parimuccatiti—
mnd4:11.1: Nanena va so pajahati dukkhanti cakkhuvinnanam rupadassanena ce naro jatidukkham pajahati, jaradukkham pajahati, byadhidukkham pajahati, maranadukkham pajahati, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasadukkham pajahatiti—
mnd4:12.2: Annena asuddhimaggena micchapatipadaya aniyyanikapathena annatra satipatthanehi annatra sammappadhanehi annatra iddhipadehi annatra indriyehi annatra balehi annatra bojjhangehi annatra ariya atthangika magga naro sujjhati visujjhati parisujjhati, muccati vimuccati parimuccati.
mnd4:12.3: Sopadhikoti sarago sadoso samoho samano satanho saditthi sakileso saupadanoti—
mnd4:13.4: Tatha vadananti tatha vadantam kathentam bhanantam dipayantam voharantam.
mnd4:13.5: “Sassato loko, idameva saccam moghamannan”ti tatha vadantam kathentam bhanantam dipayantam voharantam.
mnd4:13.13: hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana …
mnd4:13.14: neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana, idameva saccam moghamannan”ti tatha vadantam kathentam bhanantam dipayantam voharantanti—
mnd4:13.15: ditthi hi nam pava tatha vadanam.
mnd4:15.4: Ditthi hi nam pava tatha vadanan”ti.
mnd4:17.1: Na brahmano annato suddhimaha ditthe sute silavate mute vati.
mnd4:17.4: sakkayaditthi bahita hoti, vicikiccha bahita hoti, silabbataparamaso bahito hoti, rago bahito hoti, doso bahito hoti, moho bahito hoti, mano bahito hoti.
mnd4:17.5: Bahitassa honti papaka akusala dhamma sankilesika ponobhavika sadara dukkhavipaka ayatim jatijaramaraniya.
mnd4:19.2: Brahmano annena asuddhimaggena micchapatipadaya aniyyanikapathena annatra satipatthanehi annatra sammappadhanehi annatra iddhipadehi annatra indriyehi annatra balehi annatra bojjhangehi annatra ariyena atthangikena maggena suddhim visuddhim parisuddhim, muttim vimuttim parimuttim, naha na katheti na bhanati na dipayati na voharatiti—
mnd4:20.3: Te ekaccanam rupanam dassanam mangalam paccenti, ekaccanam rupanam dassanam amangalam paccenti.
mnd4:20.5: Te kalato vutthahitva abhimangalagatani rupani passanti—
mnd4:20.6: catakasakunam passanti, phussaveluvalatthim passanti, gabbhinitthim passanti, kumarakam khandhe aropetva gacchantam passanti, punnaghatam passanti, rohitamaccham passanti, ajannam passanti, ajannaratham passanti, usabham passanti, gokapilam passanti.
mnd4:20.9: Palalapunjam passanti, takkaghatam passanti, rittaghatam passanti, natam passanti, naggasamanakam passanti, kharam passanti, kharayanam passanti, ekayuttayanam passanti, kanam passanti, kunim passanti, khanjam passanti, pakkhahatam passanti, jinnakam passanti, byadhikam passanti, matam passanti.
mnd4:20.12: Te ditthena suddhim visuddhim parisuddhim muttim vimuttim parimuttim paccenti.
mnd4:21.2: Te ekaccanam saddanam savanam mangalam paccenti, ekaccanam saddanam savanam amangalam paccenti.
mnd4:21.4: Te kalato vutthahitva abhimangalagatani saddani sunanti—
mnd4:21.5: vaddhati va vaddhamanati va punnati va phussati va asokati va sumanati va sunakkhattati va sumangalati va siriti va sirivaddhati va.
mnd4:21.8: Kanoti va kuniti va khanjoti va pakkhahatoti va jinnakoti va byadhikoti va matoti va chindanti va bhindanti va daddhanti va natthanti va natthiti va.
mnd4:21.11: Te sutena suddhim visuddhim parisuddhim muttim vimuttim parimuttim paccenti.
mnd4:22.2: Te silamattena samyamamattena samvaramattena avitikkamamattena suddhim visuddhim parisuddhim muttim vimuttim parimuttim paccenti.
mnd4:22.4: “catuhi kho aham, gahapati, dhammehi samannagatam purisapuggalam pannapemi sampannakusalam paramakusalam uttamapattippattam samanam ayojjam.
mnd4:22.6: Idha, gahapati, na kayena papakam kammam karoti, na papikam vacam bhasati, na papakam sankappam sankappati, na papakam ajivam ajivati.
mnd4:22.7: Imehi kho aham, gahapati, catuhi dhammehi samannagatam purisapuggalam pannapemi sampannakusalam paramakusalam uttamapattippattam samanam ayojjam”.
mnd4:22.8: Evamevam santeke samanabrahmana silasuddhika, te silamattena samyamamattena samvaramattena avitikkamamattena suddhim visuddhim parisuddhim muttim vimuttim parimuttim paccenti.
mnd4:23.2: Te hatthivatika va honti, assavatika va honti, govatika va honti, kukkuravatika va honti, kakavatika va honti, vasudevavatika va honti, baladevavatika va honti, punnabhaddavatika va honti, manibhaddavatika va honti, aggivatika va honti, nagavatika va honti, supannavatika va honti, yakkhavatika va honti, asuravatika va honti, gandhabbavatika va honti, maharajavatika va honti, candavatika va honti, suriyavatika va honti, indavatika va honti, brahmavatika va honti, devavatika va honti, disavatika va honti.
mnd4:23.4: Te vatena suddhim visuddhim parisuddhim muttim vimuttim parimuttim paccenti.
mnd4:24.2: Te kalato utthahitva pathavim amasanti, haritam amasanti, gomayam amasanti, kacchapam amasanti, phalam akkamanti, tilavaham amasanti, phussatilam khadanti, phussatelam makkhenti, phussadantakattham khadanti, phussamattikaya nhayanti, phussasatakam nivasenti, phussavethanam vethenti.
mnd4:24.4: Te mutena suddhim visuddhim parisuddhim muttim vimuttim parimuttim paccenti.
mnd4:25.2: Brahmano ditthasuddhiyapi suddhim naha, sutasuddhiyapi suddhim naha, silasuddhiyapi suddhim naha, vatasuddhiyapi suddhim naha, mutasuddhiyapi suddhim naha na katheti na bhanati na dipayati na voharatiti—
mnd4:25.3: na brahmano annato suddhimaha ditthe sute silavate mute va.
mnd4:26.2: Punnam vuccati yam kinci tedhatukam kusalabhisankharam, apunnam vuccati sabbam akusalam.
mnd4:26.3: Yato punnabhisankharo ca apunnabhisankharo ca anenjabhisankharo ca pahina honti ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma;
mnd4:26.4: ettavata punne ca pape ca na limpati na palimpati na upalimpati alitto apalitto anupalitto nikkhanto nissato vippamutto visannutto vimariyadikatena cetasa viharatiti—
mnd4:27.4: Attanjahoti tanhavasena ditthivasena gahitam paramattham abhinivittham ajjhositam adhimuttam, sabbam tam cattam hoti vantam muttam pahinam patinissattham.
mnd4:27.5: Nayidha pakubbamanoti punnabhisankharam va apunnabhisankharam va anenjabhisankharam va apakubbamano ajanayamano asanjanayamano anibbattayamano anabhinibbattayamanoti—
mnd4:31.2: Purimam sattharam pahaya param sattharam nissita;
mnd4:31.3: purimam dhammakkhanam pahaya aparam dhammakkhanam nissita;
mnd4:31.4: purimam ganam pahaya aparam ganam nissita;
mnd4:31.5: purimam ditthim pahaya aparam ditthim nissita;
mnd4:31.6: purimam patipadam pahaya aparam patipadam nissita;
mnd4:31.7: purimam maggam pahaya aparam maggam nissita sannissita allina upagata ajjhosita adhimuttati—
mnd4:32.3: Yo rago sarago …pe… abhijjha lobho akusalamulam.
mnd4:32.4: Ejanugati ejanuga ejanugata ejanusata ejaya panna patita abhibhuta pariyadinnacitta.
mnd4:32.5: Te na taranti sanganti ragasangam dosasangam mohasangam manasangam ditthisangam kilesasangam duccaritasangam na taranti na uttaranti na pataranti na samatikkamanti na vitivattantiti—
mnd4:33.1: Te uggahayanti nirassajantiti sattharam ganhanti, tam muncitva annam sattharam ganhanti;
mnd4:33.2: dhammakkhanam ganhanti, tam muncitva annam dhammakkhanam ganhanti;
mnd4:33.3: ganam ganhanti, tam muncitva annam ganam ganhanti;
mnd4:33.4: ditthim ganhanti, tam muncitva annam ditthim ganhanti;
mnd4:33.5: patipadam ganhanti, tam muncitva annam patipadam ganhanti;
mnd4:33.6: maggam ganhanti, tam muncitva annam maggam ganhanti;
mnd4:33.7: ganhanti ca muncanti ca adiyanti ca nirassajanti cati—
mnd4:34.2: Yatha makkato aranne pavane caramano sakham ganhati, tam muncitva annam sakham ganhati.
mnd4:34.3: Evamevam puthusamanabrahmana puthuditthigatani ganhanti ca muncanti ca adiyanti ca nirassajanti cati—
mnd4:38.3: Vataniti hatthivatam va assavatam va govatam va kukkuravatam va kakavatam va vasudevavatam va baladevavatam va punnabhaddavatam va manibhaddavatam va aggivatam va nagavatam va supannavatam va yakkhavatam va asuravatam va …pe…
mnd4:38.4: disavatam va adaya samadaya adiyitva samadiyitva ganhitva paramasitva abhinivisitva.
mnd4:39.7: Sannasattoti kamasannaya byapadasannaya vihimsasannaya ditthisannaya satto visatto asatto laggo laggito palibuddho.
mnd4:39.8: Yatha bhittikhile va nagadante va bhandam sattam visattam asattam laggam laggitam palibuddham, evamevam kamasannaya byapadasannaya vihimsasannaya ditthisannaya satto visatto asatto laggo laggito palibuddhoti—
mnd4:40.3: Vedehiti veda vuccanti catusu maggesu nanam panna pannindriyam pannabalam dhammavicayasambojjhango vimamsa vipassana sammaditthi.
mnd4:40.4: Tehi vedehi jatijaramaranassa antagato antappatto, kotigato kotippatto, pariyantagato pariyantappatto, vosanagato vosanappatto, tanagato tanappatto, lenagato lenappatto, saranagato saranappatto, abhayagato abhayappatto, accutagato accutappatto, amatagato amatappatto, nibbanagato nibbanappatto.
mnd4:40.5: Vedanam va antagatoti vedagu, vedehi va antagatoti vedagu, sattannam va dhammanam viditatta vedagu.
mnd4:40.6: Sakkayaditthi vidita hoti, vicikiccha vidita hoti, silabbataparamaso vidito hoti, rago vidito hoti, doso vidito hoti, moho vidito hoti, mano vidito hoti, viditassa honti papaka akusala dhamma sankilesika ponobhavika sadara dukkhavipaka ayatim jatijaramaraniya.
mnd4:42.3: Sabbe sankhara aniccati samecca abhisamecca dhammam;
mnd4:42.4: sabbe sankhara dukkhati samecca abhisamecca dhammam;
mnd4:42.5: sabbe dhamma anattati samecca abhisamecca dhammam;
mnd4:42.31: ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipadati samecca abhisamecca dhammam;
mnd4:42.35: ayam asavanirodhagamini patipadati samecca abhisamecca dhammam;
mnd4:42.36: ime dhamma abhinneyyati samecca abhisamecca dhammam;
mnd4:42.40: ime dhamma sacchikatabbati samecca abhisamecca dhammam.
mnd4:42.41: Channam phassayatananam samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavanca nissarananca samecca abhisamecca dhammam.
mnd4:42.42: Pancannam upadanakkhandhanam samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavanca nissarananca samecca abhisamecca dhammam.
mnd4:42.43: Catunnam mahabhutanam samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavanca nissarananca samecca abhisamecca dhammam.
mnd4:42.44: Yam kinci samudayadhammam sabbam tam nirodhadhammanti samecca abhisamecca dhammanti—
mnd4:43.1: Na uccavacam gacchati bhuripannoti na sattharato sattharam gacchati, na dhammakkhanato dhammakkhanam gacchati, na ganato ganam gacchati, na ditthiya ditthim gacchati, na patipadaya patipadam gacchati, na maggato maggam gacchati.
mnd4:43.2: Bhuripannoti bhuripanno mahapanno puthupanno hasapanno javanapanno tikkhapanno nibbedhikapanno.
mnd4:43.4: Taya pathavisamaya pannaya vipulaya vitthataya samannagatoti—
mnd4:46.2: Yam kinci dittham va sutam mutam va;
mnd4:47.1: Sa sabbadhammesu visenibhuto yam kinci dittham va sutam mutam vati.
mnd4:47.3: Kayaduccaritam marasena, vaciduccaritam marasena, manoduccaritam marasena, rago marasena, doso marasena, moho marasena, kodho marasena, upanaho …pe… sabbakusalabhisankhara marasena.
mnd4:53.1: Yato catuhi ariyamaggehi sabba ca marasena sabbe ca patisenikara kilesa jita ca parajita ca bhagga vippalugga parammukha, so vuccati visenibhuto.
mnd4:53.2: So ditthe visenibhuto, sute visenibhuto, mute visenibhuto, vinnate visenibhutoti—
mnd4:53.3: sa sabbadhammesu visenibhuto yam kinci dittham va sutam mutam va.
mnd4:54.2: Tameva suddhadassim visuddhadassim parisuddhadassim vodatadassim pariyodatadassim.
mnd4:54.3: Atha va, suddhadassanam visuddhadassanam parisuddhadassanam vodatadassanam pariyodatadassanam.
mnd4:54.5: Tani chadanani vivatani honti viddhamsitani ugghatitani samugghatitani pahinani samucchinnani vupasantani patipassaddhani abhabbuppattikani nanaggina daddhani.
mnd4:54.6: Carantanti carantam vicarantam viharantam iriyantam vattentam palentam yapentam yapentanti—
mnd4:55.7: Tanhakappassa pahinatta ditthikappassa patinissatthatta kena ragena kappeyya, kena dosena kappeyya, kena mohena kappeyya, kena manena kappeyya, kaya ditthiya kappeyya, kena uddhaccena kappeyya, kaya vicikicchaya kappeyya, kehi anusayehi kappeyya—
mnd4:55.8: rattoti va dutthoti va mulhoti va vinibaddhoti va paramatthoti va vikkhepagatoti va anitthangatoti va thamagatoti va.
mnd4:55.11: nerayikoti va tiracchanayonikoti va pettivisayikoti va manussoti va devoti va rupiti va arupiti va sanniti va asanniti va nevasanninasanniti va.
mnd4:55.12: So hetu natthi, paccayo natthi, karanam natthi, yena kappeyya vikappeyya vikappam apajjeyya.
mnd4:55.13: Lokasminti apayaloke manussaloke devaloke khandhaloke dhatuloke ayatanaloketi—
mnd4:57.2: Yam kinci dittham va sutam mutam va;
mnd4:59.7: Tanhakappassa pahinatta, ditthikappassa patinissatthatta tanhakappam va ditthikappam va na kappenti na janenti na sanjanenti na nibbattenti nabhinibbattentiti—
mnd4:59.15: Tanhapurekkharassa pahinatta, ditthipurekkharassa patinissatthatta na tanham va na ditthim va purato katva caranti, na tanhadhaja na tanhaketu na tanhadhipateyya, na ditthidhaja na ditthiketu na ditthadhipateyya, na tanhaya va na ditthiya va parivarita carantiti—
mnd4:60.1: Accantasuddhiti na te vadantiti accantasuddhim samsarasuddhim akiriyaditthim sassatavadam na vadanti na kathenti na bhananti na dipayanti na voharantiti—
mnd4:61.3: abhijjhakayagantho, byapado kayagantho, silabbataparamaso kayagantho, idamsaccabhiniveso kayagantho.
mnd4:61.6: attano silam va vatam va silavatam va paramasantiti silabbataparamaso kayagantho, attano ditthi idamsaccabhiniveso kayagantho.
mnd4:61.8: Tehi ganthehi rupam adiyanti upadiyanti ganhanti paramasanti abhinivisanti;
mnd4:61.17: samsaravattam adiyanti upadiyanti ganhanti paramasanti abhinivisanti.
mnd4:61.21: Atha va ganthe gadhite ganthite bandhe vibandhe abandhe lagge laggite palibuddhe bandhane photayitva—
mnd4:61.23: Yatha vayham va ratham va sakatam va sandamanikam va sajjam visajjam karonti vikopenti;
mnd4:61.26: Atha va ganthe gathite ganthite bandhe vibandhe abandhe lagge laggite palibuddhe bandhane photayitva visajjati—
mnd4:62.2: Asa vuccati tanha yo rago sarago …pe… abhijjha lobho akusalamulam.
mnd4:62.3: Asam na kubbantiti asam na kubbanti na janenti na sanjanenti na nibbattenti na abhinibbattenti.
mnd4:62.4: Kuhinciti kuhinci kimhici katthaci ajjhattam va bahiddha va ajjhattabahiddha va.
mnd4:66.1: Simatigo brahmano tassa natthi, natva va disva va samuggahitanti.
mnd4:66.3: sakkayaditthi, vicikiccha, silabbataparamaso, ditthanusayo, vicikicchanusayo, tadekattha ca kilesa—
mnd4:66.5: Olarikam kamaragasamyojanam, patighasamyojanam, olariko kamaraganusayo, patighanusayo, tadekattha ca kilesa—
mnd4:66.7: Anusahagatam kamaragasamyojanam, patighasamyojanam, anusahagato kamaraganusayo, patighanusayo, tadekattha ca kilesa—
mnd4:66.9: Ruparago aruparago mano uddhaccam avijja, mananusayo bhavaraganusayo avijjanusayo, tadekattha ca kilesa—
mnd4:66.11: Yato ca catuhi ariyamaggehi ima catasso simayo atikkanto hoti samatikkanto vitivatto, so vuccati simatigo.
mnd4:66.13: sakkayaditthi bahita hoti, vicikiccha bahita hoti, silabbataparamaso bahito hoti …pe…
mnd4:67.1: Natvati paracittananena va natva pubbenivasanussatinanena va natva.
mnd4:67.2: Disvati mamsacakkhuna va disva dibbacakkhuna va disva.
mnd4:67.3: Simatigo brahmano tassa natthi, natva va disva va samuggahitanti.
mnd4:67.4: Tassa idam paramam aggam settham visittham pamokkham uttamam pavaranti gahitam paramattham abhinivittham ajjhositam adhimuttam natthi na santi na samvijjati nupalabbhati, pahinam samucchinnam vupasantam patipassaddham abhabbuppattikam nanaggina daddhanti—
mnd4:67.5: simatigo brahmano tassa natthi natva va disva va samuggahitam.
mnd4:68.2: Ragaratta vuccanti ye pancasu kamagunesu ratta giddha gadhita mucchita ajjhosanna lagga laggita palibuddha.
mnd4:68.3: Viragaratta vuccanti ye rupavacaraarupavacarasamapattisu ratta giddha gadhita mucchita ajjhosanna lagga laggita palibuddha.
mnd4:68.4: Na ragaragi na viragarattoti yato kamarago ca ruparago ca aruparago ca pahina honti ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma.
mnd4:69.3: Tassa idam paramam aggam settham visittham pamokkham uttamam pavaranti gahitam paramattham abhinivittham ajjhositam adhimuttam natthi na santi na samvijjati nupalabbhati, pahinam samucchinnam vupasantam patipassaddham abhabbuppattikam nanaggina daddhanti—
